original_text: Then they took hold of Joseph and they threw him into the empty well. It had no water in it.
korean_text: 그를 잡아 구덩이에 던지니 그 구덩이는 빈 것이라 그 속에 물이 없었더라

sentences.original_text: Then they took hold of Joseph
and they threw him into the empty well
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그를 빈 우물에 던져 넣었으니

sentences.original_text: It had no water in it
